name: jasyp-c4p
author: Germán Martínez Maldonado (germaaan@gmail.com)
description: Aplicación para gestionar las solicitudes para las JASYP

scripts.beautify: js-beautify --indent-with-tabs --brace-style collapse -r *.json *.js app/*.js app/routes/*.js config/*.js config/*.json test/*.js test/*/*.js src/js/*.js
scripts.jshint: jshint *.json *.js app/*.js app/routes/*.js config/*.js config/*.json test/*.js src/js/*.js
